summary: Leslie Phillips CBE  is a British actor.
full_text: Leslie Samuel Phillips, CBE  is a British actor who came to prominence in films in the 1950s, acting as a suave charmer with an exaggerated upper-class accent, in the style of Terry-Thomas. After a notable success in the Carry On films and the Doctor series, he moved away from comedy into character roles in the Harry Potter series and many TV sitcoms, as well as stage work.
title: Leslie Phillips
